summary.span: 获取或设置在向客户端反馈时用于表示服务的证书。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate to use for representing the service when communicating back to the client.

value.span: 向客户端反馈时用于表示服务的 。

span.span: The to use for representing the service when communicating back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于获取或设置用于表示服务的证书。This property is used to get or set the certificate used to represent the service. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此方法获取服务凭据中使用的证书。The following code shows how to use this method to get the certificate used in a service's credentials. summary.span: 通过指定主题可分辨名称、证书存储区名称和存储区位置来指定用于表示服务的证书。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for representing the service by specifying the subject distinguished name, the certificate store name and store location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `subjectName` 参数的更多信息，请参见 。For more information on the `subjectName` parameter, see . `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果客户端应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果客户端应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此方法设置服务凭据的证书。The following code shows how to use this method to set a certificate for a service credential. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/vb/source.vb#5)]

param.span: 客户端用于获取客户端证书的证书存储区位置。

span.span: The location of the certificate store the client uses to obtain the client certificate.

param.name: storeName
param.span: 指定要打开的 X.509 证书存储区的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

span.span: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 通过指定查询参数（如 、、 和 ）来指定用于表示服务的证书。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for representing the service by specifying query parameters such as , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果客户端应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果客户端应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. `findType` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `findType` are included in the enumeration. 最常用的枚举是 ，它在指定存储区中对证书的主题名称执行不区分大小写的搜索。The most commonly used enumeration is , which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. 这可能是不精确的搜索。This can be an imprecise search. 如果返回一个以上的证书，则使用与查找条件匹配的第一项表示客户端。If more than one certificate is returned then the first one matching the find is used to represent the client. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此方法设置服务凭据的证书。The following code shows how to use this method to set a certificate for a service credential. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/vb/source.vb#2)]
